dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1954
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Chronicles the comings and goings of visitors and workers. Notes the crafts they practice and some of the trials that ensue. Ammon Hennacy begins another fast protesting atomic weapons. Keywords: retreat, fasting
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 672 1954-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
